Blade from the Mist.name: Blade from the Mist
Blade from the Mist.flavor: You step into sight as you attack, catching your foe unprepared for your assault.
Blade from the Mist.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage. If the target couldn’t see you at the start of your turn, the attack deals extra damage equal to your Charisma modifier.
Blade from the Mist.effect: Before or after the attack, you shift your speed, and you gain phasing during the shift.

Grasp of the Obsidian Tomb.name: Grasp of the Obsidian Tomb
Grasp of the Obsidian Tomb.flavor: Shadows grasp and pull at the target, holding it in place as you prepare to deliver the final blow.
Grasp of the Obsidian Tomb.effect: The target is immobilized and cannot teleport (save ends both). In addition, you use your assassin’s shroud up to four times against the target.

Hunter's Eye.name: Hunter's Eye
Hunter's Eye.flavor: Once you have chosen a foe, it cannot escape you.
Hunter's Eye.effect: Until you use this power on a different enemy, you gain a +2 power bonus to attack rolls against the target, and you can take a standard action to determine the distance and direction to the target, ignoring all barriers. If the target is on a different plane from you, you know which plane but gain no other information about the target’s location.
